item.description: # アンドロイドのレシートチェック def check_receipt_for_android def fetch_receipt_for_android(product_id, purchase_token, token) require 'net/http' require 'net/https' require 'uri' require 'json' # path = "https://www.googleapis.com/androidpublisher/v2/applications/#{$ANDROID_PACKAGE_NAME}/purchases/products/#{product_id}/tokens/#{token}" path = "https://www.googleapis.com/androidpublisher/v1.1/applications/#{$ANDROID_PACKAGE_NAME}/inapp/#{product_id}/purchases/#{purchase_token}?access_token=#{token}" uri = URI.parse path https = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host,uri.port) https.use_ssl = true https.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE headers = {} headers["accept"] = "application/json" headers["content-type"] = "application/json" # 参考: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7346398/nethttp-failure-to-access-google-docs-list-data-api https.start do |http| return http.get(uri.request_uri, headers).body
